---
name: cc-profiler report
about: Share a cc-profiler bundle (data.json + report.html)
title: "[report] "
labels: ["performance"]
---

## Summary

Describe what felt slow (input lag, freezes, memory growth, etc.) and when it started.

## Bundle

- Attach `data.json`
- Attach `report.html`

## How it was captured

- Command used:
  - (example) `npx cc-profiler --disable-mcps claude`
- OS + terminal:
- Claude Code version:
- MCPs disabled? (yes/no)

## Repro notes

If possible:
- Approx number of turns
- Whether screenshots/plan mode/MCP tools were used
- Whether remote SSH / high latency was involved
